FW Update Reset

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x418
Size:
0x4

Description

Control register to assert FW update reset. When cleared to 0, the uc core alone is reset. When set to 1, reset is deasserted. Writes available to Caliptra subsystem, not SoC.

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:1] - - - -
[0] reset rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

reset

FW Update reset to reset core
